BlobEvent.summary: The BlobEvent interface of the MediaStream Recording API represents events associated with a . These blobs are typically, but not necessarily, associated with media content.

remarks.para:
-The base interface.
-MediaStream Recording API: Sends BlobEvent objects each time a chunk of media is ready.
-Using the MediaStream Recording API

BlobEventTimecode.summary: The timecode read-only property of the interface indicates the difference between the timestamp of the first chunk of data, and the timestamp of the first chunk in the first BlobEvent produced by this recorder.

remarks.para: Note that the timecode in the first produced BlobEvent does not need to be zero.

BlobEventData.summary: The data read-only property of the interface represents a associated with the event.

BlobEventBlobEvent.summary:
The BlobEvent() constructor returns a newly created
object with an associated .
